purpose: Handles navigation to files, functions, endpoints, and other code locations within the VS Code editor, displaying details about code items when clicked.
userVisibleActions: Click on a file item to open that file in the editor
Click on a function to jump to its definition in the source code
Click on an endpoint to navigate to its implementation
Click on an analysis item to view its details in the editor
View error messages when navigation fails to find a file or location
See the cursor positioned at the exact line and column of the selected code element
developerVisibleActions: Navigates to product items (files, functions, endpoints) from navigation trees
Opens files at specific line and column positions
Handles navigation from analysis viewer items
Resolves relative file paths against workspace root
Converts absolute paths to proper file URIs
Shows error messages when files cannot be opened
Manages text document opening and editor display
Handles navigation to entry points from code analysis

keyFunctions.name: navigateToProductItem
keyFunctions.desc: Opens files and navigates to specific code locations (functions, endpoints) from product navigation items
keyFunctions.inputs: ProductNavItem containing file path, function name, and location data
keyFunctions.outputs: Promise<void> - opens document in editor or shows error

keyFunctions.name: navigateToAnalysisItem
keyFunctions.desc: Navigates to code locations from analysis results, positioning cursor at specific lines
keyFunctions.inputs: AnalysisItem with file path and line/column information
keyFunctions.outputs: Promise<void> - opens document and sets cursor position

keyFunctions.name: navigateToEntryPoint
keyFunctions.desc: Jumps to entry point definitions in the codebase from analysis data
keyFunctions.inputs: EntryPoint object with file location and position details
keyFunctions.outputs: Promise<void> - navigates to entry point location

keyFunctions.name: showItemDetails
keyFunctions.desc: Displays detailed information about a selected code item
keyFunctions.inputs: Product item or analysis item with metadata
keyFunctions.outputs: void - shows details in appropriate VS Code panel

intent: This file exists to centralize all navigation logic for the extension, separating the concern of 'going to code locations' from other extension functionality. It solves the problem of navigating between different views (product navigator, analysis viewer) and the actual source code files, handling path resolution, error cases, and editor positioning in one place.
